page.title: 12TIMOTHY'S SCHOOL DAY.
page.content:
-on with my brothers.At bedtime we play King of the Bed.The last one pushed off is king.Then we all go to bed if we haven't got homework.
A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ANGELA. I am ten years old.On Monday I snuggled down in my thick quilt before school. I heard my Mum getting up so I got up,dressed in my blue school uniform and went to the bathroom.When I had washed I went downstairs for breakfast of Rice Crispies.At 8.20 I walked to the bus stop.In school I hung up my coat and went to the classroom.Our lessons for the day were Class Studies, Religious Education,Humanities(about farming)Maths(I did division),French and Music.At dinner we played on the grass. At 3.45 we put our chairs up and went to the buses.I got home and watched telly.
